summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Sewerage Utility; providing for the construction of separate storm and sanitary sewers across City of Seattle property acquired by Ordinance No. 83037 for a fire dump site, as specified by Plan and System Ordinance No. 84391; appropriating money therefor from the Sewer Fund; and providing that said appropriation shall be an advance to be recovered from local improvement districts proposed to be created pursuant to Resolution No. 17219 and others.
